title: @kateychaos about cass
body:
Can we expect any skin for her soon? I am veeeery dissapointed that she did not received any winter skin, I was hoping that you guys would finally make something special for her, it has been almost 4 years since her last skin, she is my main, and in the time I have been playing league (since october season 3), I have never felt the satisfaction when your main receives a cool skin, ever. So please, think about her riot.

Sincerely,
A tired of waiting player.
